Title: We All Scream for Ice Cream
Plot: A long time ago, a prank by a gang of kids known as the West End Bunch went wrong. Now grown up and a parent himself, former West-Ender Layne Banixter witnesses the friends of his youth murdered by their own children, who have turned against them. To save his own family Layne must face his fears and realize that sometimes the sins of the fathers are visited upon the son.
ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence, horror scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Brent Sheppard, Maxwell Neck, Tim Henry, Lee Tergesen, Laura Drummond, Ingrid Tesch, Colin Cunningham, Quinn Lord, William Forsythe
